interface.name: FileDownlink
interface.comment: Port to downlink a file and it's metadata

arg.name: callbackId
arg.comment: Metadata Field: Unique Id to map this file to the command that generated it

arg.name: createTime
arg.comment: Metadata Field: Time the file was created in ms epoch

arg.name: fwBuffer
arg.comment: ~!!!~ This port imposes the requirement that: - The buffer object points to memory where at most 40 bytes prior to the pointer be available for use by this method - The data pointer still points to the data stored in the buffer - The data length still indicates the size of the data stored in the buffer - The contents of the 40byte offset need not be formatted - The buffer can be clobbered by this method ~!!!~ Buffer containing the data
